songs.title: My Way
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
[?] nigga like a [?]
Got the game locked like a dreadlock
I’m having my way with this money
I’m having my way with this money yeah
I don’t have the patience for fuck shit yeah
I can’t fuck a bitch if she basic
Push button start all my cars
We beat the motherfucking odds yeah

[Verse 1]
Niggas be testing my gangsta
Like I won’t pull up with the thirty yeah
And I got a bitch and she dangerous
She kill you and you fucking homies yeah
Shoot the k and disable you niggas
Hell naw I ain’t playing with niggas
I pull this shit out my [?]
(I pull this shit out my [?])
Yes I need every dollar
I’ma stay draped in Gucci and Fendi
Niggas acting gangsta no it ain’t in em
Niggas acting gangsta no it ain’t in em
No no no no no

[Chorus]
[?] nigga like a [?]
Got the game locked like a dreadlock
I’m having my way with this money
I’m having my way with this money yeah
I don’t have the patience for fuck shit yeah
I can’t fuck a bitch if she basic
Push button start all my cars
We beat the motherfucking odds yeah

[Verse 2: Rizzo]
I got it on lock watch my angle
[?] topanga
New watch give you anger
Money speak another language
I do what I want with this money now
I don’t miss a meal I ain’t hungry now
I ball with the squad I need trophies now
I step [?] hokie pokie now
Wow [?] she in it now
Should get my money I need it now
I roll it up now I roll it now
[?] me now
She tell me she won’t let me down

[Chorus]
[?] nigga like a [?]
Got the game locked like a dreadlock
I’m having my way with this money
I’m having my way with this money yeah
I don’t have the patience for fuck shit yeah
I can’t fuck a bitch if she basic
Push button start all my cars
We beat the motherfucking odds yeah
